com.shamanland.fab

Class ShowHideOnScroll

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.GestureDetector.SimpleOnGestureListener
      • com.shamanland.fab.ScrollDetector
        • com.shamanland.fab.ShowHideOnScroll
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.view.animation.Animation.AnimationListener, android.view.GestureDetector.OnDoubleTapListener, android.view.GestureDetector.OnGestureListener, android.view.View.OnTouchListener

    public class ShowHideOnScroll
extends ScrollDetector
implements android.view.animation.Animation.AnimationListener
    Implementation of View.OnTouchListener which shows/hides specified view when onScrollUp() and onScrollDown() events recognized.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Construct object with defaults animations R.anim#floating_action_button_show and R.anim#floating_action_button_hide.

      Construct object with custom animations.
